SELECT c.*,
FROM ( SELECT a.carCate, a.carName, b.addr, b.addrDetail as selectedAddr, b.govSubsidy, b.locSubsidy, b.sumSubsidy FROM (SELECT carCate, carName FROM elecCarInfo WHERE carCate = #{carCate} AND carName = #{carName} ) a
LEFT JOIN subsidy b ON a.carName = b.carName WHERE b.addrDetail = #{selectedAddr} ) c LEFT JOIN car_eff_daily ced ON c.carCate = '승용' AND c.selectedAddr = ced.addr_detail LEFT JOIN truck_eff_daily ted ON c.carCate = '화물' AND c.selectedAddr = ted.addr_detail LEFT JOIN bus_eff_daily bed ON c.carCate = '승합' AND c.selectedAddr = bed.addr_detail LEFT JOIN motor_eff_daily med ON c.carCate = '이륜차' AND c.selectedAddr = med.addr_detail
SELECT addr FROM subsidy GROUP BY addr ORDER BY addr
SELECT addrDetail FROM (SELECT addr, addrDetail FROM subsidy GROUP BY addr, addrDetail) WHERE addr = #{addr}

CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN ced.car_eff_all_all WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN ted.truck_eff_all_all WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN bed.bus_eff_all_all WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN med.motor_eff_all_all ELSE NULL END AS effAllAll, CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN ced.CAR_EFF_ALL_FIRST WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN ted.TRUCK_EFF_ALL_FIRST WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN bed.BUS_EFF_ALL_FIRST WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN med.MOTOR_EFF_ALL_FIRST ELSE NULL END AS effAllFirst, CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN ced.CAR_EFF_ALL_CORPORATION WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN ted.TRUCK_EFF_ALL_CORPORATION WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN NULL WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN med.MOTOR_EFF_ALL_CORPORATION ELSE NULL END AS effAllCorporation, CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN ced.CAR_EFF_ALL_TAXI WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN NULL WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN NULL WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN NULL ELSE NULL END AS effAllTaxi, CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN NULL WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN ted.TRUCK_EFF_ALL_DELIVERY WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN NULL WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN med.MOTOR_EFF_ALL_DELIVERY ELSE NULL END AS effAllDelivery, CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN NULL WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN ted.TRUCK_EFF_ALL_SMALL_COMPANY WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN NULL WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN NULL ELSE NULL END AS effAllSmallCompany, CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN ced.CAR_EFF_ALL_COMMON WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN ted.TRUCK_EFF_ALL_COMMON WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN bed.BUS_EFF_ALL_COMMON WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN med.MOTOR_EFF_ALL_COMMON ELSE NULL END AS effAllCommon, CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN ced.car_eff_LEFT_all WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN ted.truck_eff_LEFT_all WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN bed.bus_eff_LEFT_all WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN med.motor_eff_LEFT_all ELSE NULL END AS effLeftAll, CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN ced.CAR_EFF_LEFT_FIRST WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN ted.TRUCK_EFF_LEFT_FIRST WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN bed.BUS_EFF_LEFT_FIRST WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN med.MOTOR_EFF_LEFT_FIRST ELSE NULL END AS effLeftFirst, CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN ced.CAR_EFF_LEFT_CORPORATION WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN ted.TRUCK_EFF_LEFT_CORPORATION WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN NULL WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN med.MOTOR_EFF_LEFT_CORPORATION ELSE NULL END AS effLeftCorporation, CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN ced.CAR_EFF_LEFT_TAXI WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN NULL WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN NULL WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN NULL ELSE NULL END AS effLeftTaxi, CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN NULL WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN ted.TRUCK_EFF_LEFT_DELIVERY WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN NULL WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN med.MOTOR_EFF_LEFT_DELIVERY ELSE NULL END AS effLeftDelivery, CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN NULL WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN ted.TRUCK_EFF_LEFT_SMALL_COMPANY WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN NULL WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN NULL ELSE NULL END AS effLeftSmallCompany, CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN ced.CAR_EFF_LEFT_COMMON WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN ted.TRUCK_EFF_LEFT_COMMON WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN bed.BUS_EFF_LEFT_COMMON WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN med.MOTOR_EFF_LEFT_COMMON ELSE NULL END AS effLeftCommon, CASE WHEN c.carCate = '승용' THEN ced.UPDATE_DT WHEN c.carCate = '화물' THEN ted.UPDATE_DT WHEN c.carCate = '승합' THEN bed.UPDATE_DT WHEN c.carCate = '이륜차' THEN med.UPDATE_DT
ELSE NULL END AS updateDt

SELECT DISTINCT a.carCate, a.carCateDetail, a.carBrand, a.carName, a.carPrice, a.person, a.speed, a.singleWarm, a.singleCold, a.batType, a.batVol, a.make, a.manu, a.link, a.imgURL, a.cateImgUrl, b.addr as subAddr, b.addrDetail as subAddrDetail, b.govSubsidy, b.locSubsidy, b.sumSubsidy,
d.email, b.addrDetail as memAddr
b.addrDetail as memAddr
FROM member d, (SELECT carCate, carCateDetail, carBrand, carName, carPrice, person, speed, singleWarm, singleCold, batType, batVol, govSubsidy, make, manu, tbSubYN, link, imgURL, cateImgUrl FROM elecCarInfo
WHERE 1=1
AND carCateDetail IN
#{cate}
AND carBrand IN
#{brand}
AND (carPrice BETWEEN #{selectedMinCarPrice} AND #{selectedMaxCarPrice} OR carPrice IS NULL)
AND tbSubYN IN
#{YN}
) a
LEFT JOIN subsidy b ON a.carName = b.carName WHERE 1=1
AND b.addrDetail = CASE WHEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(d.addr, '[^ ]+', 1, 1) = '서울' THEN '서울특별시' WHEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(d.addr, '[^ ]+', 1, 1) = '세종특별자치시' THEN '세종특별자치시' WHEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(d.addr, '[^ ]+', 1, 1) = '제주특별자치도' THEN '제주특별자치도' WHEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(d.addr, '[^ ]+', 1, 1) IN ('인천', '대전', '광주', '대구', '울산', '부산') THEN REGEXP_SUBSTR(d.addr, '[^ ]+', 1, 1) || '광역시' ELSE REGEXP_SUBSTR(d.addr, '[^ ]+', 1, 2) END
AND d.email = #{email}
AND b.addrDetail = '서울특별시'
